edu.dynamic.dynamiz.controller

Class DataFileReadWrite

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.dynamic.dynamiz.controller.DataFileReadWrite

  • public class DataFileReadWrite
extends java.lang.Object
    FileHandler is a class that reads/writes task list to/from the specified file or "todo.txt". This class is meant to be used in the same way as Java Math class: no object instance is required. Public Methods: static ArrayList getListFromFile(String filename) Gets a list of ToDoItem from the specified filename static void writeListToFile(String[] list, String filename) //Writes the given list of strings to file. Private Methods: static EventItem makeEventItem(String data) Creates an EventItem from the data read from file. static TaskItem makeTaskItem(String data) Creates a TaskItem from the data read from file. static ToDoItem makeToDoItem(String data) Creates a ToDoItem form the data read from file.

    • Method Detail

      • getListFromFile

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ToDoItem> getListFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads the task list from the from the specified filename. Stops reading on encountering IOException. May return incomplete list in such case. If the ToDoItem is marked as completed and its end date is older than the threshold date, it will be written to completed.txt and not included in the list for managing.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of file to read list from.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of ToDoItem objects.

      • writeListToFile

        public static void writeListToFile(java.lang.String[] list,
                                   java.lang.String filename)
        Writes the given list of string to the given file, with each element in the list written on a separate line.
        Parameters:
        list - The list to be written to the file.
        filename - The name of the file to write to.
